name: Faerie Noble
description: The Faerie Noble is a Medium Fey creature that showcases innate magical powers, high Charisma, and remarkable mobility both in and out of combat.
memorable: Its ability to change size and impose strong magical effects makes it a uniquely challenging opponent.
goals: To control encounters using spells and manipulate its environment to gain the upper hand.
relations: May be encountered with other fey creatures or as a powerful ally or adversary in the Feywild.
environment: Typically found in enchanted forests or other mystical realms.
strengths: Strong spellcasting abilities and condition immunities, along with high Dexterity and Charisma scores.
weaknesses: Relies heavily on spells and magical abilities for combat effectiveness, making it vulnerable in physical confrontations.
attacks: Uses Glittering Scimitars for melee attacks and a Gleaming Longbow for ranged attacks, dealing significant elemental damage.
most_powerful_ability: The Evil Eye ability can impose debilitating effects such as sleep, fright, or poison.
senses: Possesses truesight out to 60 feet and a high passive Perception of 19.
skills: Shows exceptional proficiency in Insight and Perception, making it adept in social interactions and awareness.
additional_information: Immunities to being charmed, paralyzed, poisoned, or unconscious.
Can teleport up to 60 feet as a bonus action.
Innate spellcasting with a DC of 17 allows various useful spells without components.
Can change its size between Large, Medium, and Tiny for tactical advantages.
Has high Dexterity, allowing it to evade attacks effectively.
spellcasting: Can cast spells at will such as Disguise Self, and has a variety of powerful spells like Geas and Polymorph available daily.
test_queries: magical fey creature with versatile capabilities
noble fey that can change size during battle
faerie creature with strong spellcasting abilities
cunning fey with truesight and teleportation
fey with gaze attack and various elemental damage
